data.title: Tokheim UK to unveil a range of new products at the Forecourt Show in Birmingham
data.text:
Tokheim is pleased to announce that it will be attending the Forecourt Show exhibition in Birmingham, April 20–22, 2015. The sales and service division from Tokheim UK will be welcoming their customers and visitors to stand number C50 in Hall 10.

During the show Tokheim UK will be showcasing its latest products and solutions for the fuel retail industry as well as introducing its new tank gauge and fuel management division, Tokheim ProGauge, for the first time to the UK market.

In the Dispenser area visitors will be able to experience Tokheim’s latest addition to the Quantium family, the Q510E, see the latest AdBlue Light Vehicle (LV) dispenser and interact with innovative media systems.

In the Systems and Payment area Tokheim will demonstrate a new fully customisable mobile payment application, a new retrofit media solution as well as the next generation Crypto BNA outdoor payment solution with a new user-interface and additional payment and loyalty applications. We will also present the latest version of Tokheim Eye, CCTV and security solution, which includes automatic vehicle details information display. This revolutionary system alerts site staff about the vehicle make, model and colour, making it easier to pick up on stolen vehicles or false registration plates.

Tokheim ProGauge will officially launch its latest products including a new console range and an innovative 3-D laser tank measurement tool. Alongside, Tokheim’s pioneering unmanned tank lining solution, which is extremely safe and cost-effective, will also be available for demonstration.

Date: 20-22 April 2015

Hall: 10

Stand: C50
